sources.title: Season of Passion
sources.description: Title: Season of Passion Summary: Two Australian sugarcane cutters spend their annual five-month vacations in Sydney with their mistresses. Directed by: Leslie Norman Actors: Ernest Borgnine, Anne Baxter, John Mills Production Company: Hill-Hecht-Lancaster Productions Release Date: 16 December 1961 (USA) Aspect Ratio: REMOVE_TAG Two Australian sugarcane cutters spend their annual five-month vacations in Sydney with their mistresses.

metadata.Plot: Two Australian sugarcane cutters spend their annual five-month vacations in Sydney with their mistresses.
metadata.Actors: Ernest Borgnine, Anne Baxter, John Mills
